admission_text:
No matter which level you choose, your membership helps support free exhibitions and hands-on arts programming for our community. Each level comes with exclusive benefits designed to connect you more deeply with the world of contemporary craft—whether you’re an artist, an art enthusiast, or looking to share the experience with your whole household.

[Select Family | Friend](http://web.archive.org/web/20250913173847/https://108contemporary.org/family-friend/)

[Select Artist | Individual](http://web.archive.org/web/20250913173847/https://108contemporary.org/artist-individual/)

[Click here](http://web.archive.org/web/20250913173847/https://108contemporary.org/program/craft-circle/) to learn more about our monthly Craft Circle

[Click here](http://web.archive.org/web/20250913173847/https://108contemporary.org/program/group-critique/) to learn more about our Quarterly Group Critique

* * *

***To cancel a recurring membership, please contact Jen Boyd Martin, jen@108contemporary.org**
collections_text: SHOP 108 for the Holidays for gifts and goodies hand made by local artists. With a wide range of items and prices, there is something for everyone. SHOP 108 today in the 108|Contemporary gallery or online at [shop.108contemporary.org](http://web.archive.org/web/20251220022556/https://shop.108contemporary.org/) Don't forget - 108 Members get 10% off the entire shop! Learn more about memberships [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20251220022556/https://108contemporary.org/membership/)
